SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item i JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = i.item_id
i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.is_active = b'1'
AND s.stock_amount > 0
AND i.is_pinned = 1
AND s.stock_amount < ( SELECT b.buffer_amount FROM buffer b WHERE b.item_id = i.item_id )
AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM request r WHERE r.item_id = i.item_id AND r.is_active = b'1' AND r.request_status NOT IN ('CANCEL','DONE','CONFIRM') )
AND ( SELECT MAX(l.created_at) FROM log l WHERE l.item_id = i.item_id AND l.log_type IN('IN','OUT') ) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
AND i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

r.request_id AS latestRequestId, r.request_type AS latestRequestType, r.request_amount AS latestRequestAmount, r.request_status AS latestRequestStatus, r.created_at AS latestRequestCreatedAt

LEFT JOIN request r ON r.item_id = i.item_id AND r.created_at = ( SELECT MAX(r2.created_at) FROM request r2 WHERE r2.item_id = i.item_id )
